text: Etienne Cerexhe (18 April 1931 – 24 June 2020) was a Belgian judge and academic. He was a member of the Belgian Senate from 1985 to 1987, and the Chamber of Representatives from 1988 to 1991. In 2009, Cerexhe was knighted by King Albert II. Cerexhe was born in Schaerbeek, Belgium. Cerexhe died on 24 June 2020 at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belgian academics Category:Belgian judges Category:Belgian nobility Category:Jurists Category:Parti social-chrétien politicians Category:People from Schaerbeek
title: Étienne Cerexhe
